version_description:
!Warning! This update won't work properly on iOS 6 or 7. This issue will be fixed really soon in v4.0.1. Sorry! :)

- iOS 8, iPhone 6 and 6 plus support
- new fancy look and features
- new, clear and awesome installation guide
- new status widget for easy filters main switch access
- new filter: block adult sites
- multiple improvements and bug fixes

- fix iOS 6 compatibility

If your configuration link isn't saved properly in Wi-Fi settings, please try to reset your network settings.
This is a known iOS problem and it's not Weblock bug. If the problem remains, please contact our support. We're here for you :)

Changelog for v4.3.0:
- faster and more responsive interface
- improved speed of processing rules on your device - blocking is now up to 70x faster!
- better synchronisation between devices
- fixed issues with connection status updates

Changelog for v4.2.2:
- improved widget UI
- other fixes and improvements

v4.4 changelog:
- widget problems resolved
- ad reporting extension fixed
- fewer requests made, less resources used
- many fixes and improvements

check out our other ad blocking products:
- AdBlock for blocking ads in all apps on Wi-Fi and cellular
- ADmosphere for EasyList based content blocking in Safari

v4.4 changelog:

- many fixes and improvements

check out our other ad blocking products:

- iOS 10.1 compatibility (now you can update rules by restarting apps instead of reconnecting with Wi-Fi)
- improved status view UI
- many fixes and improvements

Check out our other ad blockers: AdBlock (VPN based) and ADmosphere (Safari content blocker)!

Changes in v5.0.0:
- brand new app design. We think you'll love it!
- long awaited support for Wi-Fi and cellular with the new VPN method (old method is still supported)

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

• iPhone X support
• Safari Content Blocker added
• New, improved installation mechanism affecting Wi-Fi and cellular (available in Settings)
• Other fixes and improvements
